statements: UPDATE leaderboards SET player_name='Alice', score=100 WHERE player_id=1;
UPDATE leaderboards SET ranking=1, score=200, player_name='Bob' WHERE player_id=2;
UPDATE leaderboards SET score = 1000, ranking = 1 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE leaderboards SET ranking = 3, score = 750 WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE PlayerScores SET score=100 WHERE player_id=1;
UPDATE Rankings SET rank_position=1 WHERE player_id=2;
UPDATE PlayerScores SET score = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Rankings SET rank_position = 1, player_id = 1 WHERE rank_id = 1;
UPDATE player_scores SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE leaderboard SET rank = 10, score = 200 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_scores SET score = score + 10 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE leaderboard SET score = 1000, rank = 1 WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE scores SET score = 85.50 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
